actions.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Ordering that a message be sent to the Senate informing the Senate of the appointment of managers for the trial of the impeachment of Alcee L. Hastings, judge of the United States District Court for the Southern District of Florida.

summary.text: Provides certain administrative authorities to the managers on the part of the House of Representatives in the matter of the impeachment of Alcee L. Hastings, Judge of the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of Florida, in the preparation and conduct of the impeachment trial.

titles.title: Ordering that a message be sent to the Senate informing the Senate of the appointment of managers for the trial of the impeachment of Alcee L. Hastings, judge of the United States District Court for the Southern District of Florida.
